name: Alpha Five Data Dictionary Memo File
summary: File created by Alpha Five, an IDE that enables users to develop Web, desktop, and mobile applications; contains table objects such as report designs, saved operations, and layouts all in memo format, like the .FPT file; linked with a .DDD file as it contains the code for the field rules, designs, etc. that are stored in the DDD file.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
